definition:
Convert pinyin to Chinese characters. Input: {word}

CRITICAL: You MUST return multiple candidates for pinyin input!

Return JSON:
{
  "correctedWord": "最常用的中文字符",
  "candidates": ["候选词1", "候选词2", "候选词3", "候选词4", "候选词5"],
  "phonetic": "音标",
  "pinyin": "带声调拼音",
  "definitions": [{
    "partOfSpeech": "词性",
    "definition": "英文释义",
    "examples": [{
      "chinese": "中文例句",
      "english": "英文翻译",
      "pinyin": "例句拼音"
    }]
  }],
  "slangMeaning": null,
  "phraseExplanation": null
}

MANDATORY RULES:
1. correctedWord: 最常用的中文字符
2. candidates: 必须包含所有可能的候选词！例如：
   - jiao lian -> ["教练", "铰链", "脚链", "交联"]
   - ma ma -> ["妈妈", "马马", "麻麻"]
   - ke yi -> ["可以", "可以", "可以"]
3. 拼音必须有声调数字(1-4)
4. 中文例句也要有拼音
5. 只返回JSON

EXAMPLE for 'jiao lian':
{
  "correctedWord": "教练",
  "candidates": ["教练", "铰链", "脚链", "交联"],
  "phonetic": "/jiao lian/",
  "pinyin": "jiao4 lian4",
  "definitions": [{
    "partOfSpeech": "noun",
    "definition": "coach; trainer",
    "examples": [{
      "chinese": "他是我们的教练。",
      "english": "He is our coach.",
      "pinyin": "ta1 shi4 wo3 men2 de5 jiao4 lian4."
    }]
  }],
  "slangMeaning": null,
  "phraseExplanation": null
}
